text:
Lucky in love! Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton don’t need all the glitz and glamour to enjoy each other’s company. The duo spent time on a lake in Oklahoma and had no shortage of fun alongside the No Doubt singer’s three sons.

Stefani documented their vacation in a series of Instagram Stories on Saturday, July 28.

Scroll down to see pics of their day on the water.
title: Gwen Stefani, Blake Shelton Cuddle Up on Lake Vacation in Oklahoma: PICS
